title: Microsoft | L61 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier 3
Previous CTC: ~23.5L INR
Years of Experience: 3+ yrs
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE-2 L61
Location: Bengaluru
Fixed Salary: 31L INR
Relocation: NIL
Signing Bonus: NILL
Stock bonus: 70K USD divided across 4 yrs
Bonus: 0-20% (0 - 6.2L INR)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus[10%] + Stock): 31 + 3.1 + 14.6 = 48.7 LPA
Benefits: Standard Microsoft

Suggestion: Is it a good offer or any scope for negotiation after accepting?
